chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
King Beslan Mitsobar,
      p. 41â€”Queen Tylin's son.  He is mild-mannered,
      has a soft voice sharp eyes, and black hair to his shoulders.  Upon her
      death, he was raised King of Altara, though he is of course a puppet of
      the Seanchan government there.  However, it does make him the
      equal of Suroth under the law, at least in principle.
      See also
      Mitsobar, Tylin Quintara.
